CustomField.description: It's age from open to close, displayed in format hh:mi:ss
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(CreatedDate) || ISBLANK(ClosedDate), "", TEXT( FLOOR((ClosedDate - CreatedDate) * 24) ) & ":" & RIGHT("0" & TEXT(FLOOR(MOD((ClosedDate - CreatedDate) * 24 * 60, 60))), 2) & ":" & RIGHT("0" & TEXT(FLOOR(MOD((ClosedDate - CreatedDate) * 24 * 60 * 60, 60))), 2) )
CustomField.label: Handling Time
